project.name: C-C088B-SUBV-03-ST03-DT04-DF15-CF24-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C088B-SUBV-03-ST03-DT04-DF15-CF24-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository This weakness takes a filename from an untrusted source and uses a subprocess (via popen) to perform a search and replace of the text "hello" with "Hello". The untrusted input is not properly sanitized, and may be used to perform an argument injection on the base command in order to run additional commands or functions.

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
